Package com.aevi.authentication

This package provides classes for performing a user authentication request to the Device.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationRequest
    The AuthenticationRequest object represents a user authentication request made to the Aevi platform.
    AuthenticationResult
    Returned by the Aevi platform after an AuthenticationRequest has been completed.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Role
    Part of a AuthenticationRequest, this class contains the roles a user can have when authenticated.

Package com.aevi.authentication Description

This package provides classes for performing a user authentication request to the Device. The User Authentication mechanism provides a method to guard sections of an app for certain user roles. When the request is send the user is presented with a PIN entry screen that allows someone to identify themselves. After a successful authentication a role is returned to the calling app. This role can subsequently be used to permit access to certain features or screens. After a AuthenticationRequest has been send, the resulting user Role can be found be examining the AuthenticationResult class that can be obtained from the Intent response.
